name: Travel like a Local - Be EXCITED, BE THRILLED and BE HAPPY
description: THE MOST AMAZING THING ABOUT MY TRIP IS THAT YOU GUYS will enjoy like you never before, try things you never done before this is something you guys will CREATE by yourself, i will your guide and you will do what you want to be happy (only happy things ok) i want you to bring the memories back home to where you from and tell a lot of story out of it ..the REAL FUN CREATOR is YOU.
